title: RBI monetary policy: With no rate cuts in October, is RBI falling behind the curve? Experts weigh in
description:
RBI monetary policy: Controlling inflation is like taming a wild horse—a task that's never easy and requires constant vigilance. Just ask the RBI Governor Shaktikanta Das.

Today, Das announced that the inflation horse has finally been led back to the stable, inching closer to the target range. But ...
